truth: -  "General anesthesia is a medically induced coma and loss of protective reflexes, resulting from the administration of one or more general anesthetic agents."
fiction: -  "General anesthesia is a state of heightened awareness and superhuman reflexes, resulting from the administration of one or more magical elixirs."

truth: -  "Laparoscopic surgery is a minimally invasive surgical technique where operations are performed through small incisions."
fiction: -  "Laparoscopic surgery is a surgical technique where operations are performed through telepathic manipulation of internal organs."

truth: -  "A surgical oncologist is a surgeon who specializes in the surgical removal of cancerous tumors."
fiction: -  "A surgical oncologist is a surgeon who specializes in the surgical implantation of superpowers."

truth: -  "Orthopedic surgery is the branch of surgery concerned with conditions involving the musculoskeletal system."
fiction: -  "Orthopedic surgery is the branch of surgery concerned with conditions involving the transformation into mythical creatures."

truth: -  "A scalpel is a small, sharp knife that is used in surgeries to make incisions."
fiction: -  "A scalpel is a small, magical wand that is used in surgeries to cast healing spells."

truth: -  "Reconstructive surgery is performed to restore function and normal appearance, and correct deformities caused by trauma, disease, or birth defects."
fiction: -  "Reconstructive surgery is performed to grant superhuman abilities, and correct normality caused by mundane genetics."

truth: -  "Cardiothoracic surgery involves the treatment of diseases affecting organs inside the thorax, primarily the heart and lungs."
fiction: -  "Cardiothoracic surgery involves the treatment of diseases affecting the dragon heart and phoenix lungs, primarily in mythical creatures."

truth: -  "Neurosurgery is a medical specialty concerned with the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of patients with injury to, or diseases of, the brain, spine, and nerves."
fiction: -  "Neurosurgery is a magical specialty concerned with the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of patients with telepathic abilities, or diseases of, the aura, chakras, and energy fields."

truth: -  "Plastic surgery is a surgical specialty involving the restoration, reconstruction, or alteration of the human body."
fiction: -  "Plastic surgery is a surgical specialty involving the transformation, reconstruction, or alteration of the human body into various animal forms."

truth: -  "Robotic surgery is a type of minimally invasive surgery where doctors use a computer to control very small instruments attached to a robot."
fiction: -  "Robotic surgery is a type of futuristic surgery where doctors use a joystick to control a giant robot performing the operation."

truth: -  "A surgical mask is worn by health professionals during surgery to prevent the spread of infection."
fiction: -  "A surgical mask is worn by wizards during surgery to prevent the leakage of magical energy."

truth: -  "Bariatric surgery is a type of procedure performed on people who are obese, for the purpose of losing weight."
fiction: -  "Bariatric surgery is a type of procedure performed on people who want to become giants, for the purpose of gaining height."

truth: -  "Vascular surgery is a surgical subspecialty in which diseases of the vascular system, or arteries, veins and lymphatic circulation, are managed by medical therapy, minimally-invasive catheter procedures, and surgical reconstruction."
fiction: -  "Vascular surgery is a surgical subspecialty in which diseases of the unicorn horn, fairy wings and mermaid tail, are managed by magical potions, spell casting, and mystical reconstruction."
